verses.verse: He <S%H376><s%> that being often <S%H8433>reproved<s%> <S%H7185>hardeneth<s%> his <S%H6203>neck<s%> Shall <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> be <S%H7665>destroyed<s%>, and that without <S%H4832>remedy<s%>.

When the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> are <S%H7235>increased<s%>, the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>; But when a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man beareth <S%H4910>rule<s%>, the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H584>sigh<s%>.

Whoso <S%H376><s%> <S%H157>loveth<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiceth<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>; But he that keepeth <S%H7462>company<s%> with <S%H2181>harlots<s%> <S%H6>wasteth<s%> his <S%H1952>substance<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%> by <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H5975>establisheth<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; But <S%H376>he<s%> that exacteth <S%H8641>gifts<s%> overthroweth <S%H2040>it<s%>.
A <S%H1397>man<s%> that <S%H2505>flattereth<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H6566>Spreadeth<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for his <S%H6471>steps<s%>.
In the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> there is a <S%H4170>snare<s%>; But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> doth <S%H7442>sing<s%> and <S%H8056>rejoice<s%>.
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H3045>taketh<s%> knowledge of the <S%H1779>cause<s%> of the <S%H1800>poor<s%>; The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> hath not <S%H995>understanding<s%> to know <S%H1847>it<s%>.
Scoffers3944, 582 <S%H6315>set<s%> a <S%H7151>city<s%> in a <S%H6315>flame<s%>; But <S%H2450>wise<s%> men turn <S%H7725>away<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%>.

If a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> hath a <S%H8199>controversy<s%> with a <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, Whether he be <S%H7264>angry<s%> or <S%H7832>laugh<s%>, there will be no <S%H5183>rest<s%>.
The <S%H582>bloodthirsty<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> him that is <S%H8535>perfect<s%>; And as for the <S%H3477>upright<s%>, they <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%>.
A <S%H3684>fool<s%> <S%H3318>uttereth<s%> all his <S%H7307>anger<s%>; But a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H7623>keepeth<s%> it back and stilleth <S%H268>it<s%>.
If a <S%H4910>ruler<s%> <S%H7181>hearkeneth<s%> to <S%H1697>falsehood<s%>, All his <S%H8334>servants<s%> are <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
The <S%H7326>poor<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and the <S%H8501>oppressor<s%> meet <S%H6298>together<s%>; <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H215>lighteneth<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of them <S%H8147>both<s%>.
The <S%H4428>king<s%> that <S%H571>faithfully<s%> <S%H8199>judgeth<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%>, His <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
The <S%H7626>rod<s%> and <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; But a <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H7971>left<s%> to himself causeth <S%H954>shame<s%> to his <S%H517>mother<s%>.
When the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H7235>increased<s%>, <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H7235>increaseth<s%>; But the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H7200>look<s%> upon their <S%H4658>fall<s%>.
Correct <S%H3256><s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, and he will give thee <S%H5117>rest<s%>; <S%H5414>Yea<s%>, he will give <S%H4574>delight<s%> unto thy <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Where there is no <S%H2377>vision<s%>, the <S%H5971>people<s%> cast off <S%H6544>restraint<s%>; But he that <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%>, happy is <S%H835>he<s%>.
A <S%H5650>servant<s%> will not be <S%H3256>corrected<s%> by <S%H1697>words<s%>; For though he <S%H995>understand<s%>, he will not give <S%H4617>heed<s%>.
Seest <S%H2372><s%> thou a <S%H376>man<s%> that is <S%H213>hasty<s%> in his <S%H1697>words<s%>? There is more <S%H8615>hope<s%> of a fool than of <S%H3684>him<s%>.
He that delicately bringeth <S%H6445>up<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> from a <S%H5290>child<s%> Shall have him become a <S%H4497>son<s%> at the <S%H319>last<s%>.
An <S%H639>angry<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> stirreth <S%H1624>up<s%> <S%H4066>strife<s%>, And a <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H1167>man<s%> aboundeth <S%H7227>in<s%> <S%H6588>transgression<s%>.
A <S%H120>man<s%>'s <S%H1346>pride<s%> shall bring him <S%H8213>low<s%>; But he that is of a <S%H8217>lowly<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H8551>obtain<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%>.
Whoso is <S%H2505>partner<s%> with a <S%H1590>thief<s%> <S%H8130>hateth<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>; He <S%H8085>heareth<s%> the <S%H423>adjuration<s%> and uttereth <S%H5046>nothing<s%>.
The <S%H2731>fear<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5414>bringeth<s%> a <S%H4170>snare<s%>; But whoso putteth his <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall be <S%H7682>safe<s%>.
Many <S%H7227><s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H4910>ruler<s%>'s <S%H6440>favor<s%>; But a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H4941>judgment<s%> cometh from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

An <S%H5766>unjust<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; And he that is <S%H3477>upright<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
